import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Form(props) { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [repassword, setRePassword] = useState(""); const signupForm = (title) => { return (

{title}

{ setName(e.target.value) }} name="name" />
{ setEmail(e.target.value) }} />
{ setPassword(e.target.value) }} />
{ setRePassword(e.target.value) }} />
); } const signinForm = (title) => { return (

{title}

); } if (props.type === 'signup') { return signupForm(props.title) } else if (props.type === 'signin') { return signinForm(props.title) } } export default Form
